entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 7:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure: 104.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -41.2°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
